mapper.insert: insert into doctor(doc_name, doc_loginno, doc_password, doc_sex, doc_age, doc_speciality, doc_desc, doc_medicineId, doc_headimg, crtuser, crtdate, raw_hos_id, doc_medicine_name) VALUES (#{docName}, #{docLoginno}, #{docPasswordMd5}, #{docSex}, #{docAge}, #{docSpeciality}, #{docDesc}, #{docMedicineId}, #{docHeadimg}, #{crtuser}, now(), #{rawHosId}, #{docMedicineName})
mapper.update: update doctor set inquirprice = #{inquirprice} where doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.select: select doc_id, doc_name, doc_loginno, doc_password, doc_sex, doc_age, doc_speciality, doc_desc, doc_medicineId, doc_hospital, doc_headimg, isadmin, ishosadmin, doc_school, doc_position, doc_score, raw_doc_id, raw_hos_id, doc_phone, doc_medicine_name, doc_hospital_name, inquirprice, h.hos_id, h.hos_area, h.hos_city, h.hos_awards, h.hos_desc, h.hos_grade, h.hos_logo, h.hos_linkphone, h.hos_medicine, h.hos_name, h.hos_address, h.hos_website, h.hos_latitude, h.hos_longitude, h.raw_hospital_id, h.hos_type, (select data_name from bs_basedict where dict_code = 'HOS01' and data_code = h.hos_grade) hos_grade_name, (select name from city where city_id = h.hos_city) hos_city_name, (select name from area where area_id = h.hos_area) hos_area_name from doctor d left join hospital h on d.raw_hos_id = h.raw_hospital_id where d.doc_loginno = #{docLoginno} and d.doc_password = #{docPasswordMd5} and d.recsts = '1'

select doc_id, doc_name, doc_loginno, doc_password, doc_sex, doc_age, doc_speciality, doc_desc, doc_medicineId, doc_hospital, doc_headimg, doc_medicine_name, doc_hospital_name, isadmin, ishosadmin from doctor d where recsts = '1'
and raw_hos_id = #{rawHosId}
and doc_name like concat('%', #{docName}, '%')
and doc_loginno like concat('%', #{docLoginno}, '%')

select doc_id, doc_name, doc_loginno, doc_password, doc_sex, doc_age, doc_speciality, doc_desc, doc_medicineId, doc_hospital, doc_headimg, doc_medicine_name,doc_hospital_name, doc_medicine_name, isadmin, ishosadmin from doctor d where recsts = '1' and doc_id = #{id}

select count(*) from doctor where doc_loginno = #{docLoginno}
and doc_id != #{docId}
select count(*) from doctor where raw_hos_id = #{rawHosId} and recsts = '1'
SELECT COUNT(c.doc_medicine_name) FROM (SELECT doc_medicine_name FROM doctor WHERE raw_hos_id = #{rawHosId} GROUP BY doc_medicine_name) c;
